metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25511 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability incuobjdump, where a division-by-zero error may enable a user to cause acrash, which may lead to a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
